definition: to order with the chin/to indicate what one wants by facial gesture
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy
lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy
lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy
one command brings a hundred responses (idiom); having hundreds of attendants at one's beck and call
bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
servile and bending the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
the eye can see nothing worthwhile all around (idiom); arrogant/condescending/supercilious
to think little of/to look down on
